subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: Checks that chosen statements are not line-wrapped. By default, this Check restricts wrapping import and package statements, but it's possible to check any statement.

tr.td:
subset of tokens
IMPORT , STATIC_IMPORT , PACKAGE_DEF , CLASS_DEF , METHOD_DEF , CTOR_DEF , ENUM_DEF , INTERFACE_DEF , RECORD_DEF , COMPACT_CTOR_DEF .
